title: Om murugA enrAl uLLam
sahitya:
Om murugA enrAl uLLam urugumayya Uzvinai koDum tunbam uDanE karugumayyA


anupallavi

  kAmam ellAm muruga nAmattil vaittE kAntamena izhukkum kazhal tanil naguttEn


caraNam    murugA murugA ena muraiyiDa vAi uNDu mULum paDaittuLLa munai migum vEluNDu
aru mAmarai pOTrum aruL shakti bAlanai amarar tuyar tIrtta Arumukha shIlanai
